text: Tony Zasada (11 December 1960 - 19 August 1984) was a Canadian rower. He competed in the men's coxed pair event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. He was killed in a road crash five days after the conclusion of the 1984 Olympics. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:1984 deaths Category:Canadian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Canada Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers from Hamilton, Ontario Category:Pan American Games medalists in rowing Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Canada Category:Rowers at the 1983 Pan American Games Category:Road incident deaths in Canada
title: Tony Zasada
